page.title: 09Places of Worship.
page.content: By Ladysmith Middle School. There are a large number of denominations represented in this area.The largest is the Church of England with the most number of churches.These are dominated by the nearby Cathedral of Exeter.The other denominations which are represented by more than one church are the Methodists,Roman Catholics and the United Reform. The smaller churches are the Gospels,Baptists, Christian Scientists,Spiritualists, Jehovah's Witness and the Church of Jesus Christ of Later Day Saints. Historically the area was dominated by Polsloe Priory which was built on land given to the nuns by William de Tracey, one of the knights who slew Thomas a Beckett. The priory was destroyed during the dissolution by Henry V111.
